name: Kokku Cookie Banner
author: Kokku

sections.description:
This plugin delivers a GDPR cookie consent banner to your WordPress websites.

License

This file is part of Kokku Cookie Banner plugin.

Kokku Cookie Banner plugin is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published
by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

Kokku Cookie Banner plugin is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

Get a copy of the GNU General Public License in http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
sections.installation:
• Upload plugin files to your plugins folder, or install using WordPress built-in Add New Plugin installer;
  • Activate the plugin;
  • Navigate to Plugin Settings and fill settings.
sections.faq:
What is the plugin license?

  • This plugin is released under a GPL license.
sections.changelog:
1.8.9

  • WordPress 6.4 and PHP 8.0.3 compatibility.

1.8.8

  • Styling fixes for backward compatibility support.

1.8.7

  • Add more styling setting options for flexible layouts (page scroll, vertical positioning).
  • Retain old settings when upgrading to a new version with new settings for new setting options.

1.8.6

  • Fix issue where the checkbox for necessary cookies is not disabled by default on front site.

1.8.5

  • More fixes regarding data output escaping.

1.8.4

  • More fixes regarding data output escaping.

1.8.3

  • More fixes regarding data sanitization and escaping.

1.8.2

  • Correct issues for approval to WordPress Plugin Directory.

1.8.1

  • New theme setting option, styling changes.
  • Minor fix to GTM trigger javascript function.
  • Add version number to all assets to prevent cache issue.

1.8.0

  • Refactoring frontend javascript code for cookie management, minor styling fixes.

1.7.0

  • Introduce webpack for assets bundling (remember to run bundling script before each delivery)

1.6.0

  • More styling setting options

1.5.0

  • Add multilingual support for the plugin.

1.0

  • Notes of the version.
